name: LimRox's First Videogame!
description:
This is my first ever videogame released on itch.io, this is a VERY rough prototype of a game that'll be a ball roller, the reason I'm doing this is because I'm intrested in videogame development and how it's made, but for now I'll stick with the simple stuff.

Enjoy this very short level 1 of "Ball Roller!"

This game name/design will change in the future, but will not be paid.
